page.title: 10Firbeck.
page.content: In {Firbeck}there is one church that people can go to on sunday.It is called {St.Martin's}.It has a church yard with family graves in.There is one special grave stone belonging to the {Green Lady}.It has got all bars around it.People say that the green lady drowned herself in the local lake.They call her the green lady because when they got her out she was covered in green weed.{Park Hill}used to be a big private house with a stream at the bottom of the grounds.It was owned by the{St.Ledger}family.They have a football field with two benches an empty sand pit and some steps.There is a small hospital that is used for people with bad injuries learn to live a normal life.There is a village hall,a pub called the Black Lion and a club.The buses that run to {Firbeck}are the 145,146 & 147.
